title: "Llamas, Life Online, and Lessons Learned"
excerpt: "The temptation for us in the news business is to blame the ills of social media and smartphones for the denigration of our national discourse and the devastation of our industry. But that narrative is not just incomplete—it’s dangerously self-serving. None of those problems happened without our complicity and, often, encouragement."
